list_definition.definition: to plunge headfirst into water or down through the air

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He dived off a rock into the sea.

list_definition.definition: to go quickly and suddenly out of sight

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She dived down a back street and into a shop.
She did a beautiful dive into the deep end of the pool.
